## carbonio-ui-preview package

A library to open previews of images and pdf.

## Functions

<table><thead><tr><th>

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[usePreview()](./carbonio-ui-preview.usepreview.md)


</td><td>

Util hook to quick access to the preview functions


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

## Variables

<table><thead><tr><th>

Variable


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[ImagePreview](./carbonio-ui-preview.imagepreview.md)


</td><td>

Main component for rendering the preview of an image


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[PdfPreview](./carbonio-ui-preview.pdfpreview.md)


</td><td>

Main component for the preview of a pdf


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[PreviewManager](./carbonio-ui-preview.previewmanager.md)


</td><td>

The manager for showing multiple previews. From within it, the PreviewsManagerContext give access to the functions to initialize and open the previews of different items.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[PreviewsManagerContext](./carbonio-ui-preview.previewsmanagercontext.md)


</td><td>

The context give access to the functions needed to manage multiple previews. It must be used together with the PreviewManager.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[PreviewWrapper](./carbonio-ui-preview.previewwrapper.md)


</td><td>

Show the preview for a video, an image or a pdf. This component is just a wrapper on the two specific preview components.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

## Type Aliases

<table><thead><tr><th>

Type Alias


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[MakeOptional](./carbonio-ui-preview.makeoptional.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[PreviewItem](./carbonio-ui-preview.previewitem.md)


</td><td>

Define an item for the preview. It can be of type 'image' or 'pdf'. The id is required to control the opening of the preview after its initialization.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[PreviewWrapperProps](./carbonio-ui-preview.previewwrapperprops.md)
